meanings: (정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)
Knowing too much is a disease; Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise; Ignorance is the peace of life
Knowing too much is a disease; Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise; Ignorance is the peace of life
in the manner of one being unaware of something, unwittingly
It is not of one's concern
think one knows something, but actually does not know it

meanings.meaning: I've only got one pair of hands
Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance?

vlive.korean: 서로를 얼마냐 아느냐. Let's test how well we know each other. 듣기 View video KNK : [마이 크나큰 텔레비전] #52 크나큰(KNK) Happy Halloween! Part.2
vlive.english: Let's test how well we know each other.

vlive.korean: 전하. - 그만해라! 내가 누구인지 아느냐! Your Highness. - Stop it! Do you know who I am! 듣기 View video stellar : 효율 가로방송👀
vlive.english: Your Highness. - Stop it! Do you know who I am!

vlive.korean: 알까? Does he know? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
다 알죠! I know it all! 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🐯🎂💖✌️

examples.korean: Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance? (Edgar Bergen) 발음듣기 열심히 일하다 죽은 사람은 하나도 없지만 혹시 아느냐? (에드가 버겐, 지혜명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance? (Edgar Bergen) 발음

examples.korean: So remember kids, it’s not what you know, it’s who you know. 발음듣기 그러니까 얘들아 잘 알아둬. 네가 뭘 아는게 중요한 게 아니라, 누구를 아느냐가 중요한 거야. DARAKWON
examples.english: So remember kids, it’s not what you know, it’s who you know. 발음

examples.korean: Do you know anyone so capable as John. 발음듣기 존만큼 유능한 사람을 아느냐. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do you know anyone so capable as John. 발음

examples.korean: Do you know anyone so capable as Irene 발음듣기 아이린만큼 그렇게 유능한 사람을 아느냐 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: Do you know anyone so capable as Irene 발음

examples.korean: He has a look-who-I-am air about him. 발음듣기 그 사람에게는 "내가 누군 줄 아느냐"는 식의 태도가 있다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: He has a look-who-I-am air about him. 발음
